articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week we’ve added to the Leafly database a collection of sativas, indicas, and hybrids with rich genetic backgrounds that will make you appreciate the care that goes into the breeding process. From TGA Seeds, we have Dr. Who and The Third Dimension, two hybrids that will help you in your magical journeys through time and space. Nevil’s Wreck is everything you’d want in a sativa strain, especially if you’re a patient treating depression or fatigue. Kandahar blesses us with age-old indica genetics that stretch back to Afghanistan, and the newer Kushadelic proves that not all indicas will knock you out cold.
Did you come across any new strains this week? Share your thoughts, feelings, and experiences in a review for your fellow Leafly comrades!
1. Dr. Who
Characteristics of Dr. Who:

60% indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Mad Scientist and Timewreck
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Pineapple and grape aroma
Clear-headed and relaxing
May help with pain, stress, appetite loss, multiple sclerosis, ADHD, mood disorders, and nausea
Indoor flowering time of 56 to 63 days

2. Nevil’s Wreck
Characteristics of Nevil’s Wreck:

80% sativa
Cross between Arcata Trainwreck and Neville’s Haze
Breeder: Rare Dankness Seeds
Spicy, floral aroma
Uplifting and alert
May treat depression, fatigue, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 65 to 115 days

3. Kandahar
Characteristics of Kandahar:

90% indica
Cross between Afghani and an unknown Afghani Skunk
Breeder: Ministry of Cannabis
Earthy, woody, nutty aroma
Powerful but functional buzz, relaxing
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

4. Kushadelic
Characteristics of Kushadelic:

80% indica
Cross between G-13 Haze and OG Kush
Earthy, floral, citrus aroma
Comfortable, versatile effects conducive for social gatherings
Indoor flowering time of 10 to 11 weeks

5. The Third Dimension
Characteristics of The Third Dimension:

60% sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Apollo 13, Jack’s Cleaner, and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Mango, pineapple, and lemon aroma
Creative and stress-relieving
Indoor flowering time of 45 to 50 days
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Dr. Who, Nevil’s Wreck, Kandahar, Kushadelic, and The Third Dimension

description: Kushadelic from Soma Seeds mixes the potency of indica with the cerebral energy of a sativa in this G-13 Haze and OG Kush cross. Whether you’re out socializing or enjoying your own company, Kushadelic provides a comfortable, versatile buzz in moderate doses. The floral, citrus aroma from Kushadelic’s Haze genetics pierces through dominant earthy and hashy notes. Soma recommends growing Kushadelic in organic soil and allowing 10 to 11 weeks for its full flowering indoors.
descriptionPlain: Kushadelic from Soma Seeds mixes the potency of indica with the cerebral energy of a sativa in this G-13 Haze and OG Kush cross. Whether you’re out socializing or enjoying your own company, Kushadelic provides a comfortable, versatile buzz in moderate doses. The floral, citrus aroma from Kushadelic’s Haze genetics pierces through dominant earthy and hashy notes. Soma recommends growing Kushadelic in organic soil and allowing 10 to 11 weeks for its full flowering indoors.

highlightedReviews.text: Proud to be one of the first people reviewing this strain! Been an avid bud toker for 8 years now, have tried plenty of strains since then and this one definitely leaves a mark. If you're lucky enough to get some of same buds as me you can expect some definite kick in your hit. This is easily one of the more potent of buds I've smoked. Is it the greatest strain I've ever smoked? Definitely not, but It's name and potency definitely leave a mark. It gives you some pretty epic dry eyes and I added "Loss of Memory" to the effects list because it does give you a major dose of that. Don't know why that isn't an pre-added effect I definitely feel certain strains effect that more than others, Oh well. The taste is not the greatest either but it's not the worst. It's all preference! I think the potency of this particular strain easily makes up for it! So yeah, definitely would recommend this strain if you're considering it or saw it at your local dispensary and get it before it's gone! Hope this helps! (Excuse me if I made any mistakes or typos had to smoke a fresh sample for an accurate review lol.)
Very leafy buds but very sleepy effects! Good tree very green big leafy nugs! Smells and tastes amazing!

name: Kushadelic
